_metadata.v6_usage: Use these artifacts as discoverable lore items in zones. 'location' maps to V6 zone IDs.

artifacts.name: Arcade Token
artifacts.description: A brass token stamped with 'HARD COPY ARCADE - GOOD FOR ONE PLAY'. The edges are worn smooth.
artifacts.lore: These tokens were never sold. They were given as rewards for high scores. How did you find one?

artifacts.name: Beaded Curtain Strand
artifacts.description: A single strand of wooden beads from the curtain between the arcade and bookstore. They click softly when you move.
artifacts.lore: The curtain has been there since the store opened. Some beads are missing. This strand fell on its own.

artifacts.name: Occult Bookmark
artifacts.description: A leather bookmark with a symbol you don't recognize. It was marking a page about 'liminal spaces'.
artifacts.lore: The book it was in is gone. Only this remains. The symbol seems to shift when you're not looking directly at it.

artifacts.name: AOL Trial CD
artifacts.description: An AOL free trial CD. '1000 FREE HOURS!' The plastic is cracked but the disc is pristine.
artifacts.lore: This CD is from 1997. The account it would create still exists. Something is using those free hours.

artifacts.name: Pong Paddle Grip
artifacts.description: A rubber grip from the Pong cabinet's paddle controller. Worn smooth by thousands of hands.
artifacts.lore: The Pong machine still works. This grip fell off, but the paddle plays better without it. As if it wanted to be free.

artifacts.name: Cheap Sunglasses
artifacts.description: Knockoff Ray-Bans with scratched lenses. One arm is loose.
artifacts.lore: Everyone had a pair like this in the 90s. This pair outlasted its owner's interest.

artifacts.name: Sticker Sheets
artifacts.description: Sheets of band stickers. Some are peeled, some pristine. Bands you've never heard of.
artifacts.lore: BORED says these are 'vintage'. They're from 2003.

artifacts.name: Graffiti Marker
artifacts.description: A fat marker with silver ink. Almost empty.
artifacts.lore: Half the tags in the mall were made with this marker. The other half with its twin, which is lost.

artifacts.name: Torn Band Poster
artifacts.description: Half a poster for a band called 'STATIC VOID'. Tour dates from 1999.
artifacts.lore: They never made it big. The bassist works at COMPHUT now. Or did.

artifacts.name: Mall Keychain
artifacts.description: A keychain with 'EASTLAND MALL' in faded letters. No keys attached.
artifacts.lore: Given out during the grand opening. That was decades ago. The mall remembers.

artifacts.name: Dead Watch Battery
artifacts.description: A tiny silver disc. Completely drained.
artifacts.lore: Time stopped for someone here. The battery kept going until it couldn't.

artifacts.name: Cracked Lens
artifacts.description: A prescription lens with a hairline crack. Someone's world is blurry now.
artifacts.lore: Milo remembers this customer. They never came back for the repair.

artifacts.name: Eye Chart Fragment
artifacts.description: A torn piece of an eye chart. Just the bottom lines. The letters no one can read.
artifacts.lore: E F P T O Z... the letters spell something if you arrange them right.

artifacts.name: Unlabeled VHS Tape
artifacts.description: A VHS tape with no label. The case is cracked.
artifacts.lore: Someone recorded over the original content. What's on here now is... unclear.

artifacts.name: Dead AA Battery
artifacts.description: A corroded battery. Leaked acid.
artifacts.lore: From a Walkman that stopped working in 1994. The music ended.

artifacts.name: Floppy Disk
artifacts.description: A 3.5" floppy disk. Label says 'IMPORTANT - DO NOT DELETE'.
artifacts.lore: 1.44 MB of something crucial. Or something someone thought was crucial. No way to know now.

artifacts.name: Coiled Phone Cord
artifacts.description: A beige coiled phone cord. Stretched out and kinked.
artifacts.lore: Connected to dial-up internet once. The sounds it carried... modems screaming into the void.

artifacts.name: Cricket Trading Card
artifacts.description: A card featuring a cricket player mid-swing. Stats on the back you don't understand.
artifacts.lore: Worth nothing here. Worth something somewhere. Geography is value.

artifacts.name: Generic Comic Book
artifacts.description: A comic about a hero called 'The Adequate Avenger'. Issue #1. Never a #2.
artifacts.lore: The publisher went bankrupt. Only 500 copies exist. Still not valuable.

artifacts.name: Empty Dice Bag
artifacts.description: A velvet bag that once held gaming dice. The drawstring is broken.
artifacts.lore: Someone's campaign ended here. The dice scattered. Some say they're still rolling.

artifacts.name: Broken Calculator
artifacts.description: A calculator missing the '7' key. Display shows 'ERROR'.
artifacts.lore: From Out-of-Service Merchandise. Sold as-is. Returned anyway. Sold again.

artifacts.name: Expired Warranty Card
artifacts.description: A warranty card. Expired in 1998. For a product that no longer exists.
artifacts.lore: The warranty was voided the moment it was purchased. That was the business model.

artifacts.name: Missing Screw
artifacts.description: A tiny screw. The one that was always missing from the box.
artifacts.lore: Every product was missing this screw. It was here all along.

artifacts.name: Leather Wallet
artifacts.description: A men's wallet. Empty except for an expired coupon.
artifacts.lore: Lost in the anchor store. Never claimed. The coupon was for 20% off. It's still expired.

artifacts.name: Gift Card
artifacts.description: A mall gift card. $25 balance. The magnetic strip is damaged.
artifacts.lore: A gift from someone who didn't know what to get. Now ungettable.

artifacts.name: Undeveloped Film Roll
artifacts.description: A roll of 35mm film. Never developed.
artifacts.lore: 24 exposures of something. Or nothing. Schrodinger's memories.

artifacts.name: Escalator Grease
artifacts.description: A small container of industrial grease. For escalator maintenance.
artifacts.lore: The escalators stopped working years ago. This grease was never used. It's still fresh.

artifacts.name: Mannequin Hand
artifacts.description: A plastic hand, feminine, fingers posed elegantly. Detached from its body.
artifacts.lore: The mannequin it belonged to is still in the anchor store. It's missing this hand. It's been missing it for years.

artifacts.name: Necronomicon Bookmark
artifacts.description: A bookmark from a book that shouldn't exist. The text is in a language you don't recognize.
artifacts.lore: The book was never in the bookstore. But this was. How did it get here?

artifacts.name: Food Court Tray
artifacts.description: A plastic tray with dried ketchup. Orange. Institutional.
artifacts.lore: Thousands of meals were served on this tray. None of them memorable.

artifacts.name: Empty Slushee Cup
artifacts.description: A wax paper cup. Blue raspberry stains. The only thing that still works down here.
artifacts.lore: The slushee machine has outlived the mall. It will outlive us all.

artifacts.name: Pretzel Salt Packet
artifacts.description: A tiny packet of pretzel salt. From a place that never opened.
artifacts.lore: Pretzel Hut was COMING SOON for three years. Then NOW CLOSED. The salt remains.

artifacts.name: Utility Keychain
artifacts.description: A keychain with a dozen keys. None labeled. All for doors that no longer lock.
artifacts.lore: The janitor who owned this retired. Or disappeared. No one's sure.

artifacts.name: Unfinished Work Order
artifacts.description: A work order for 'strange sounds in anchor store'. Never completed.
artifacts.lore: The maintenance guy heard the sounds. He quit that day. The sounds continue.

artifacts.name: Phone Charm
artifacts.description: A tiny plastic charm for a flip phone. A cat with sunglasses.
artifacts.lore: Peak 2004 fashion. The phone it adorned is in a landfill. The charm lives on.

artifacts.name: Screen Protector
artifacts.description: A screen protector with an air bubble that never came out.
artifacts.lore: Applied wrong. Lived with. Accepted. The human condition.

artifacts.name: Old Receipt
artifacts.description: A thermal paper receipt. The ink has faded. You can barely make out the total.
artifacts.lore: Someone bought something here once. It mattered at the time.

artifacts.name: Movie Ticket Stub
artifacts.description: A ticket stub for Screen 1. The movie title is torn off.
artifacts.lore: Someone saw something here. They kept the stub. Then lost it.

artifacts.name: Unpopped Kernel
artifacts.description: A single popcorn kernel. Survived the popper. Survived the movie. Survived.
artifacts.lore: The last kernel from the last batch. The popcorn machine is empty now.

artifacts.name: 3D Glasses
artifacts.description: Cheap cardboard 3D glasses. One lens is missing.
artifacts.lore: From a 3D movie that didn't need to be in 3D. None of them did.

artifacts.name: Lost Earring
artifacts.description: A single earring. Cubic zirconia. The other is somewhere in Screen 1.
artifacts.lore: Lost during an emotional scene. Or a makeout session. Or both.
